reviewText: Anchorman 1 and 2 are the greatest man humor movies ever. The steel book makes it a great collectors edition for fans of the movies. I can literally watch both everyday. Worth the buy!
Two great movies, one incredible deal. Very happy with this purchase.

Anchorman 1 and 2 are great movies and so funny and I love that they put both of them together in a steelbook. I love Will Ferrell and the whole cast makes the movie so funny. The artwork on the steelbook inside is ao cool
Not as good as Anchorman, but still pretty good!!!!

Huge package with the 2 Anchorman, and even a third movie (wake up Ron Bugundy, an new movie with outtakes from the 1st).
Contains the Super SIze Unrated version of "Anchorman 2".
About the movies, well, it's incredibly funny.
Will Ferrell is a comedy genius, like Steve Carell who play Brick.
A lot of extras will make you fell that you'd love to have a party with these crazy guys.
I just miss "french subtitles" on the audio commentaries.
DVD's come in a cool tin case.  Great deal for 2 movies. Item arrived in 2 days. If you're a fan of the movies,  it's a must have.
Great quality and on time delivery.  I had never seen the 2 movie pack together before and I was looking for it for so long
